LanguageData.DDJY_WoolSheepProduction.label: Wool Sheep Growth
LanguageData.DDJY_WoolSheepProduction.description: Genes extracted from sheep can now be safely fused with human genes through gene-editing technology, resulting in a material that turns human hair into wool sheep.
LanguageData.DDJY_ClothProduction.label: Cloth Growth
LanguageData.DDJY_ClothProduction.description: Genes extracted from cotton can now be safely fused with human genes through gene-editing technology, resulting in a material that turns human hair into cloth fibers.
LanguageData.DDJY_SynthreadProduction.label: Synthread Growth
LanguageData.DDJY_SynthreadProduction.description: An unparalleled biotechnology that can turn human hair into Synthread, although the exact process is unknown.
LanguageData.DDJY_DevilstrandClothProduction.label: Devilstrand Cloth Growth
LanguageData.DDJY_DevilstrandClothProduction.descript: Genes extracted from devil mushrooms can now be safely fused with human genes through gene-editing technology, resulting in a material that turns human hair into devilstrand cloth fibers.
LanguageData.DDJY_HyperweaveProduction.label: Hyperweave Growth
LanguageData.DDJY_HyperweaveProduction.description: An unparalleled biotechnology that can turn human hair into hyperweave fibers, although the exact process is unknown.
